    • Constructor Detail

      • Move

        public Move(Coordinate initCoordinate,
            Coordinate finalCoordinate,
            Piece piece)
        Creates a move object. Promotions are represented as movement to the same square and the piece represented is the piece to be promoted to.
        Parameters:
        initCoordinate - The initial move coordinate.
        finalCoordinate - The coordinate of the final move.
        piece - The piece that was moved

      • Move

        public Move(Coordinate initCoordinate,
            Coordinate finalCoordinate,
            Piece piece,
            Square captureSquare)
        Creates a move object. Promotions are represented as movement to the same square and the piece represented is the piece to be promoted to.
        Parameters:
        initCoordinate - The initial move coordinate.
        finalCoordinate - The coordinate of the final move.
        piece - The piece that was moved
        captureSquare - The square of the piece that was captured.
